document.full_text: bahrain's foreign minister said on friday the gulf arab state was not trying to dissolve the biggest opposition party, in comments that came after the united states criticized legal action against the group, wefaq.
document.title: bahrain says will not disband opposition groups: minister
lines_and_colors: bahrain's foreign minister said on friday the gulf arab state was not trying to dissolve the biggest opposition party, in comments that came after the united states criticized legal action against the group, wefaq.
